rows.label: qst630301_msg0001
rows.name:
Masterpon, Hana have
small request to make.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0002
rows.name: Mo-mo? What this about?

rows.label: qst630301_msg0003
rows.name:
Could it be...Hana eyeing up secret
Tasty Sausage stash of Tora?

rows.label: qst630301_msg0004
rows.name: Masterpon can keep sausages.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0005
rows.name: Not even little bit interested?!

rows.label: qst630301_msg0006
rows.name:
There something Hana has
been wanting to try out.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0007
rows.name: Wanting to...try out...?

rows.label: qst630301_msg0008
rows.name:
Like novel combination of Tasty
Sausage and Avaritia Noodle Soup?

rows.label: qst630301_msg0009
rows.name: Masterpon can keep sausage soup.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0010
rows.name:
What that attitude?! Tora not
raise Hana to have no appreciation
for finer things...

rows.label: qst630301_msg0011
rows.name: What Hana want to try is love potion.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0012
rows.name: Love potion?!

rows.label: qst630301_msg0013
rows.name: Wh-who Hana want use love potion on?!

rows.label: qst630301_msg0014
rows.name: On Hana.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0015
rows.name:
Hana use love potion...on Hana?!
Is Hana need more self-esteem?
Want to love self more?

rows.label: qst630301_msg0016
rows.name: That not what Hana mean.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0017
rows.name:
Hana want to find out if potion
like that have any effect on Hana.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0018
rows.name: Mo-mo-mo...

rows.label: qst630301_msg0019
rows.name:
Hana have good point. That
very intriguing experiment...

rows.label: qst630301_msg0020
rows.name: All right! Tora make potion for Hana!

rows.label: qst630301_msg0021
rows.name: Masterpon know how to make love potion?

rows.label: qst630301_msg0022
rows.name:
Should be easy-peasy with
proper ingredients.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0024
rows.name: Masterpon so amazing!

rows.label: qst630301_msg0025
rows.name: Mo-mo-mo!

rows.label: qst630301_msg0026
rows.name:
Only problem is, ingredients maybe
little bit tricky to gather.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0027
rows.name: What ingredients Masterpon need?

rows.label: qst630301_msg0028
rows.name:
Oh, all kind of ingredient.
But most tricky is plant
called Flutterheart Grass.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0029
rows.name:
Very rare plant, only grow in place
called Sealed Quarry in Luxuria.

rows.label: qst630301_msg0030
rows.name:
That sound quite arduous task...
Will Masterpon go to all trouble
of get rare plant for Hana?

rows.label: qst630301_msg0031
rows.name:
Of course! Tora do very best
to make Boss fetch plant!

rows.label: qst630301_msg0032
rows.name:
Once rare plant obtained, all we
need do is cook up potion at most
burningest place in Avaritia!

rows.label: qst630301_msg0033
rows.name: Understood! Time to start mission!
